Network headquarters has not actively solicited new
participating members. It was felt that present facilities
did not warrant too great an expansion at this time* On the
other hand, no active member of NAEB was refused the network
service if it wrote in requesting information. In this way,
the network, like Topsy, "just growed” to its present size
of forty"three stations0
